titleStmt.title: Exceeding joyful newes from the narrow seas, Dover, and the Irish Seas being a true and exact reiation of the victorious proceedings, and renowned exploits, performed by the right honourable, Robert Earl of Warwicke, Lord Admirall of His Majesties navie royall in this expedition, MDCXLII ... likewise a true description of the manner of his scouring the seas and all the ports thereabouts ... with the names of every particular ship ... / sent ... by Iohn Philips to his brother ...
titleStmt.author: Philips, John.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
